raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated autofix LLM version from `copilot_gpt_41` to `copilot_gpt_51` in code scanning documentation.
- Enhanced GitHub App installation restrictions:
  - Added organization-level control to restrict installations to owners only.
  - Consolidated reusable documentation snippets (`repo-admin-install-restriction`).
  - Expanded app access policies to include outside collaborators in requests.
  - Renamed and updated policy documentation for clarity (`limiting-oauth-app-and-github-app-access-requests-and-installations.md`).
